channel.title: Easy question for some good with scar.. thanks
channel.description: Hey i was thinking i could use scar for a FPS game as an aimbot cause it a color picker. But i was wondering what the string would be to make it go to the color when it sees an oppenent. O and just to let u guys know i used to play runescape for a long time so that how i know about scar. Thanks guys any help appreciated.

item.title: Easy question for some good with scar.. thanks
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

blah bah7:

it will work, all that scar does is picks a color and clicks on it

Yes, well if the mouse is held in place at the center of the window, how does it move to a certain coordinate?

Read full topic
item.source: Easy question for some good with scar.. thanks

item.title: Easy question for some good with scar.. thanks
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:3, topic:129701”] var x, y: Integer; begin if (FindColorTolerance(x, y, Color, xs, ys, xe, ye, tolerance)) then begin MoveMouse(x, y); //If it has aimbot detector, you'll have to find a better Mouse procedure. //ClickMouse(x, y, true); //If you want to click? end; end.

Something like that?[/quote]

Will that work if it hijacks the mouse?

Read full topic
item.source: Easy question for some good with scar.. thanks

item.title: Easy question for some good with scar.. thanks
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

var x, y: Integer;
begin
  if (FindColorTolerance(x, y, Color, xs, ys, xe, ye, tolerance)) then
  begin
    MoveMouse(x, y); //If it has aimbot detector, you'll have to find a better Mouse procedure.
    //ClickMouse(x, y, true); //If you want to click?
  end;
end.

Something like that?

Read full topic
item.source: Easy question for some good with scar.. thanks
